org.hps.recon.tracking.kalman

Class MeasurementSite

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hps.recon.tracking.kalman.MeasurementSite

  • class MeasurementSite
extends Object
    Kalman fit measurement site, one for each silicon-strip detector with hits
